review:
Dr. Rhea and her team were very polite and friendly and were accommodating. They explained the issues and were able to treat the problem professionally. 
Great job with my wisdom tooth removal

Dr. Rhea Mathew is a very patient-friendly *** ****** ************* ******* Got a root canal treatment done by her - she did an amazing and seamless job. She's also flexible with scheduling appointments and very professional with her approach. Highly recommended!

I had severe pain in my lower back teeth and visited Dr. Rhea for the same ,As i was very apprehensive, she explained me the whole procedure calmly and treated me patiently .The root canal procedure was absolutely painless ,thank you doctor and undoubtedly i could recommend everyone to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Rhea was very receptive to my needs and explained the treatment options very well.  

Had a very pleasant and non painful experience. 

Would confidently recommend her service.

review: The doctor was quick and efficient witt her treatment. She also gave valuable advice about how to prevent future problems.

Efficient doctor !!
Excellent service !! 
Superb clinic !! 
Doctor is friendly and patient is made clear about the issue, feels so comfortable and very satisfied with the treatment.

Very friendly service 
Very cordial response towards patients 
Swift reaction towards enquires 
Good response and informative

Doctor made me comfortable regarding the treatment. She was very nice to give time if the treatment was painful. She extracted one of my tooth but I could not even feel it. Overall Dr. Rhea Mathew is a fine Dentist, she can do wonders!

Very friendly ************* *** **** ******** Painless treatment. Very satisfied. I was happy with my treatment. They did it effortlessly. And charged minimum . My entire family goes there and we are pleased with the treatment.

One of the BAD experience in my life,
in that dental clinic *** ****** **** ***** **** **** ** ****** *******
i didn't find Dr.Mathew in the clinic when i was visited four or five times.

before doing filling they are not tell the patient what is the amount will be charged.after finishing they are telling the amount.

overall the treatment was not satisfy, only my money Rs.4500/- has gone to clinic for two sitting.
reply_text: Noted your grievance, kindly let me know how we can address your problem, you have my number, please give me a call and  we will see to it that all your problems are addressed and you get value for your money as your satisfaction is our prime concern, regards

review: I was extremely comfortable with Dr.rhea. Being a person whos scared of dentists from childhood i was really worried about getting my treatment done. But the way she made me comfortable was really appreciable. She has become a motivation for me to do my regular dental checkups. Would strongly recommend this wonder doctor to everyone looking for a healthy and beautiful smile
